creator: dard@mail.ru
text:
RewriteMap directive seems to be broken when using "Randomized Plain Text" 
option. 
apache_1.3.23/src/modules/standard/mod_rewrite.c, 3017
return (int)((double)(rand() % RAND_MAX) / RAND_MAX) * (h - l + 1) + l;
rather then
return ((double)(rand() % RAND_MAX) / RAND_MAX) * (h - l + 1) + l;
causes that the only value is everytime selected from text file is the first 
value, so randomize not working.

This problem has been fixed in CVS.  The fix will be available in the next
release, due out soon.
Thanks.
creator: slive@apache.org
